quoteText: You hereby confirm that you are at least 18 years old of age, or that you are 13 years or older, and you have the consent of a parent or legal guardian.
title: This service is only available to users of a certain age

tosdr.case: This service is only available to users of a certain age
tosdr.tldr: The Terms and Conditions state that in order to use BetterHelp, users must be at least 18 years old of age, or that users are 13 years or older, with the consent of a parent or legal guardian.
